DOC.brief_summary: Incorporating neurocognitive visual reaction train show increase bat performance collegiate baseball player . However , poor methodology , lack control group use unreliable outcome measure , limit strength previous study . Therefore purpose study determine effect neurocognitive visual reaction train reaction time coordination athletic population .
